params.rewardToken: Token address (part of merkle tree structure)
params.voteType: The type of vote (Against, For, Abstain)

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setAvatar(address).details: Sets the avatar to a new avatar (`newAvatar`).

setTarget(address).details: Sets the target to a new target (`newTarget`).

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

castVote(uint256,uint8,uint256,address,b.notice: Cast a vote with merkle proof verification

currentMerkleRoot().notice: Current merkle root for voting power verification

hasVoted(uint256,address).notice: Check if an address has voted

ipfsHash().notice: IPFS hash for current merkle root metadata

ipfsHashCid().notice: The optional ipfs hash CID containing metadata about the root (e.g. the merkle tree itself).

setAvatar(address).notice: Can only be called by the current owner.

setTarget(address).notice: Can only be called by the current owner.

setUp(bytes).notice: Sets up the module for factory deployment

state(uint256).notice: Get the state of a proposal
